thread.title: The Actress With the Most Daring Dress-and-Shoe Combo at the Oscars
thread.title_full: The Actress With the Most Daring Dress-and-Shoe Combo at the Oscars

title: The Actress With the Most Daring Dress-and-Shoe Combo at the Oscars
text:
by Nicole Akhtarzad 
Tonight at the 89th annual Academy Awards, Naomie Harris, who is nominated this year for her role in Moonlight , stepped out in what is now Raf Simmons’s first official red carpet moment in his role as the new chief creative officer at fashion house Calvin Klein. What a way to begin, with Harris sweeping everyone off their feet in a midi-length, sequined, and strapless white dress with a floor-length train. Aside from the unexpected color , proportion play, cool cutout, and on-point fit, what really wowed us about Harris’s look was actually her shoes. Not only were the two-strapped yellow sandals the perfect pop of color to complement the dress, but also, the mismatched embellishments on the straps of each shoe have us planning our next DIY! 
Scroll through to see her full look, get a close-up at her shoes, and shop some of our favorite white strapless dresses to channel her look. 1 / 5
